column4: Hey . . .  I have a quick question. . . . I'm seriously considering switching to ubuntu . . . . .  My wife wants to continue using the computer for Scrapbooking. . . .  does a package exist on Linux?
what's Scrapbooking, a program to make a scrapbook? i.e. print one out

If your wife has used Windows Scrapbook for years, she won't be happy with anything thats even a little different. See if you can run the Windows program in Wine or maybe the commercial version of Wine.
